Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Loomis
ShortDescription: EB 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Library/State-Van Buren
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing at Library/State-Van Buren due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Library/State-Van Buren due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
